Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- message('check');message('check');
declare
V_uname varchar2(30);
v_pass varchar2(30);
v_utype varchar2(20);
v_path varchar2(50);
show_alt number;
v_alert alert:=find_alert('mess');

param_list_id ParamList; 
begin
 
 param_list_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('param_data'); 
 /* Test if the parameter list already exists; if not, create it. ID_NULL is a function that returns a Boolean value indicating if the object is available. */ 
 IF NOT ID_NULL(param_list_id) THEN 
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(param_list_id); 
 END IF; 
 param_list_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('param_data'); 
 ADD_PARAMETER(param_list_id, 'emp_id', TEXT_PARAMETER, :parameter.emp_id); 
 ADD_PARAMETER(param_list_id, 'emp_name', TEXT_PARAMETER, :parameter.emp_name); 
 call_FORM('job2.fmx', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, NO_QUERY_ONLY, param_list_id); 
 -- OPEN_FORM('job2.fmx');
 
 
 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
param_list_id ParamList; cnt number; 
begin

 
 param_list_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('param_data'); 
 /* Test if the parameter list already exists; if not, create it. ID_NULL is a function that returns a Boolean value indicating if the object is available. */ 
 IF NOT ID_NULL(param_list_id) THEN 
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(param_list_id); 
 END IF; 
 param_list_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('param_data'); 
 ADD_PARAMETER(param_list_id, 'emp_id', TEXT_PARAMETER, :parameter.emp_id); 
 ADD_PARAMETER(param_list_id, 'emp_name', TEXT_PARAMETER, :parameter.emp_name); 
 
 IF :GLOBAL.MNA = 'N' THEN
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNT FROM PRF
 WHERE EMP_ID=:parameter.emp_id;
 
 IF CNT > 0 THEN 
 
 call_FORM('prf.fmx', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, NO_QUERY_ONLY, param_list_id); 
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('NO Appraisal for you.');
 MESSAGE('NO Appraisal for you.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 else
 call_FORM('prf.fmx', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, NO_QUERY_ONLY, param_list_id); 
 
 end if;
 
 
 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare cnt number;
 begin
 select count(*) into cnt from EMP_ATTENDANCE where emp_id=:parameter.emp_id and in_out=1 and emp_date=to_date(sysdate);

HIDE_WINDOW('ATTENDANCE');
if cnt=1 then
show_WINDOW('welcome');
else

show_window('main');

go_block('control');
go_item('CHECKOUT');
end if;
 end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:

go_block('control');

/*

*/

Graphics.Name: TEXT215
Graphics.GraphicsText:
YOUR Attendance Marked
 NOT PUNCHED 
FOR YESTERDAY OUTGOING!!!

ProgramUnit.Name: LOGOUT_ATTENDANCE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE LOGOUT_ATTENDANCE IS
cnt number;
BEGIN

if :GLOBAL.CHECKOUT='Y' then 
 insert into EMP_ATTENDANCE 
(emp_id, 
emp_timing, 
emp_date, 
in_out)
values( :global.emp_id,to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI'),to_date(sysdate),3);
forms_ddl('commit');
 message('GOOD BYE '|| :global.ename);
 else
 exit_form;
end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATTENDANCE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE attendance IS
cnt number;
BEGIN
 insert into EMP_ATTENDANCE 
(emp_id, 
emp_timing, 
emp_date, 
in_out)
values(:parameter.emp_id,to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI'),to_date(sysdate),3);
forms_ddl('commit');

 select count(*) into cnt from EMP_ATTENDANCE where emp_id=:parameter.emp_id and in_out=3 and emp_date=to_date(sysdate);

if cnt=1 then
-- message('GOOD BYE Mr. '||:emp_name);
 message('GOOD BYE Mr. '||:emp_name);
end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRE_LOGIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pre_login IS

 w number;
 h number;
 w1 number;
 h1 number;
 cw number;
 ch number;
begin
go_block('P_ORGANIZATIONS');
EXECUTE_QUERY;
--select organization_logo,t.apps_name,t.footer into :global.apps,:global.footer,:global.logo from P_ORGANIZATIONS t 
--where apps_name is not null and footer is not null;
--:footer:=:global.footer;
--:GLOBAL.FOOTER:=:FOOTER;
--:GLOBAL.APPS:=:APPS_NAME;
Set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,title,:footer);
 set_window_property('MAIN',title,:apps_name);
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
 
 
 w := get_canvas_property('main',width);
 h := get_canvas_property('main',height);
 set_window_property('main',window_size,w,h);
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
 w1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,width);
 h1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,height);
 cw := (w1 - w)/2;
 ch := (h1 - h)/4;
 set_window_property('main',x_pos,cw);
 set_window_property('main',y_pos,ch);
 
 w := get_canvas_property('attendance',width);
 h := get_canvas_property('attendance',height);
 set_window_property('attendance',window_size,w,h);
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
 w1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,width);
 h1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,height);
 cw := (w1 - w)/2;
 ch := (h1 - h)/2;
 set_window_property('attendance',x_pos,cw);
 set_window_property('attendance',y_pos,ch);
 
 w := get_canvas_property('welcome',width);
 h := get_canvas_property('welcome',height);
 set_window_property('welcome',window_size,w,h);
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
 w1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,width);
 h1 := get_window_property(forms_mdi_window,height);
 cw := (w1 - w)/2;
 ch := (h1 - h)/2;
 set_window_property('welcome',x_pos,cw);
 set_window_property('welcome',y_pos,ch);
 
 
 
 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 mna char(1);
 VPERM number;cnt number;
 cnt1 number;
 CNT2 NUMBER;
 CNT3 NUMBER;
 newjobs number;
 alertjobs number;
 -- timer_id Timer;
 -- half_minute NUMBER(5) := 2000; 
begin
 -- timer_id := CREATE_TIMER('login_timer', 50,repeat);
 

 
 select count(*) into vperm from EMPLOYEE t WHERE T.ACTIVE='Y' AND T.PERMISSION='Y'
 and emp_id=:parameter.emp_id;
 
 
if vperm=0 THEN
 set_item_property('DEPINFO',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('ORGINFO',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('PRF_IQ',enabled,property_false); 


else
 
 set_item_property('PRF',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('ATTENDANCE',enabled,property_false); 
 set_item_property('PRF_RPT',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('sd_admin',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('job',enabled,property_false); 
 set_item_property('rep_project',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('Proj_sum',enabled,property_false); 
 set_item_property('weekly',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('rep_task',enabled,property_false); 
 set_item_property('track_sum',enabled,property_false); 
 
 
END IF;

 select employee.mgr into mna from employee where employee.emp_id = :parameter.emp_id;
 :global.mna:=mna;
 IF mna = 'N' THEN 
 set_item_property('sd_admin',enabled,property_false);
 set_item_property('PRF_RPT',enabled,property_false);
 -- set_item_property('PRF',enabled,property_false); 
 -- set_item_property('Project',enabled,property_false);
 -- set_item_property('JOB_TYPE',enabled,property_false);
 END IF;
 
 pre_login; 
go_block('EMPLOYEE');
 execute_query;
 go_block('control');
 
 select count(*) into cnt from EMP_ATTENDANCE where emp_id=:parameter.emp_id and in_out=1 and emp_date=to_date(sysdate);

select count(*) into cnt1 from EMP_ATTENDANCE where emp_id=:parameter.emp_id and in_out=3 and emp_date=to_date(sysdate)-1;

SELECT count(*) INTO cnt2 
 FROM P_DATE_MASTER c
 WHERE c.DATED = to_date(sysdate)-1
 and TO_CHAR(c.DATED, 'DY') = 'FRI';
 
 
 
 SELECT count(*) into cnt3
 FROM SECOND_SATURDAY Y
 WHERE Y.DATED = to_date(sysdate)-1;
 
 select count(*) into :NEW from V_TASK t
where emp_id = :parameter.emp_id
and t.status='Open';

 select count(*) into :ALERT from V_TASK t
where emp_id = :parameter.emp_id
and t.status='ALERT';

if cnt1=0 and cnt2=0 and cnt3=0 then
-- message('YESTERDAY NOT PUNCHED');
--- message('YESTERDAY NOT PUNCHED');
--:save:='Accept';
show_window('attendance');
-- message('Welcome '||:emp_name);
-- message('Welcome '||:emp_name);
END IF;

if cnt=1 and cnt1 > 0 then
 


show_window('welcome');

 --message('Welcome '||:emp_name);
-- message('Welcome '||:emp_name);
end if;

end;
